channel.title: Item on item
channel.description: Hello guys I was wondering how I can do item on item to be more specific I put all the spirit shield sigils on my server, but how can I make it so if I use a Sigil on spirit shield I'll get that spirit shield I tried using the search button nothing came up please help.

item.title: Item on item
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Go to ( ( client.java ) ) and search for

case 53

And add this among other codes

if ((itemUsed == XXXX) && (useWith == YYYY)) { deleteItem(XXXX, getItemSlot(XXXX), 1); deleteItem(YYYY, getItemSlot(YYYY), 1); addItem(ZZZZ, 1); sM("YOUR TEXT."); }

X , Y , Z are self explanatory.

Read full topic
